Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: Excuse me, Lieutenant Ray, We're docking at Side 7 now. Please report to the bridge at once.

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: Very well. Your name is <MainCharacter>, isn't it?

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: Yes, Sir

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: How long have you been in the military?

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: 6 months, sir/6 months, sir/3 years, sir/2 years, sir

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: Once we mass-produce the Gundam, we'll be able to end the war without sending young men like you into battle.

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: That picture is...

Scripts.Speaker: Select2
Scripts.Content: Your son, sir?/Maybe your son. What's his name?

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: Yes. I hear there are boys his age fighting as guerrillas. Is that true?

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: His name is Amuro. I hear there are boys his age fighting as guerrillas. Is that true?

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: Yes, I'm told that it happens.

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: How terrible.

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: Lieutenant Farrell, we've completed the inspection of Gundam 1

Scripts.Speaker: Farrell
Scripts.Content: Thank you. Let's go back to Whitebase

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: ... Lieutenant Farrell

Scripts.Speaker: Farrell
Scripts.Content: Why, what's wrong?

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: Can I stay on board while Gundam is loaded on the white base?

Scripts.Speaker: Farrell
Scripts.Content: What does that mean?

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: I'm a candidate pilot, so I don't think I'll have many chances to board, so I'd like to ride it now!

Scripts.Speaker: Farrell
Scripts.Content: You'd be dizzy if you were lying in the cockpit.

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: It's all right. Don't worry

Scripts.Speaker: Farrell
Scripts.Content: Okay, I'll meet you in Whitebase

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: Thank you!
